title: REGULATING ENTERPRISE DATABASE WAREHOUSE RESOURCE USAGE
summary: <SOH> BRIEF DESCRIPTION OF THE DRAWINGS <EOH>FIG. 1 is an illustration of an EDW system in accordance with the present disclosure. FIG. 2 is an illustration of a data flow of queries in an EDW system. FIG. 3 illustrates an example EDW architecture for managing computing resources among tenants in accordance with the present disclosure FIG. 4 illustrates an example of a system for managing computing resources among tenants in accordance with the present disclosure. FIGS. 5-6 illustrate examples of systems according to the present disclosure. FIG. 7 illustrates a flow chart of an example method for resource management among database tenants according to the present disclosure. detailed-description description="Detailed Description" end="lead"?
abstract: Regulating enterprise database warehouse resource usage can include identifying a number of queries in an enterprise database warehouse (EDW) and regulating EDW resource usage among the number of queries.
